description:
Uploads metadata to COG-UK CLIMB via the Majora API
See https://docs.covid19.climb.ac.uk/majora-api.

output.name: created
output.description: A list of IDs which have been created.

output.name: updated
output.description: A list of IDs which have been updated.

output.name: ignored
output.description: A list of IDs which have been ignored due to errors.

output.name: data
output.description: The datatable containing status and error messages for each submitted sample.
